title: Haiti
summary:
Citi Haiti, established in 1971, is a fully owned branch of Citibank N.A., New York. 
Citi Haiti offers key banking services, such as Trade Finance, Liquidity Management, Domestic and International Account Structures, CitiDirect BE and FX Management. 
Citi Haiti contributes to the community of the island country by sponsoring local projects that aim to provide health care, develop computer literacy, improve quality of life for low-income families and provide post natural disaster efforts.
tag-2: For over 50 years, Citi Haiti has served local and multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector entities.
